prospects.name: Green Valley Ranch (Station Casinos)
prospects.notes: PRIORITY #1. Station Casinos locals property IN Henderson. Est. 1,500-2,000 employees. 143,891 sq ft casino + hotel. Community-focused operator, Fertitta family-owned. Ask for Director of Facilities or BOH Operations Manager. Station corporate: (702) 495-4270. Score: 92/100. Multiple BOH break rooms. 24/7 shifts = round-the-clock vending revenue.

prospects.name: Sunset Station (Station Casinos)
prospects.notes: Henderson location, est. 1,000-1,200 employees. Station Casinos property ‚Äî bundle with Green Valley Ranch pitch. Same corporate umbrella. Ask for Director of Facilities. Score: 90/100. Locals casino with hotel, restaurants, bowling, movie theater. Strong employee base across all shifts.

prospects.name: Durango Casino & Resort (Station Casinos)
prospects.address: 6170 S Durango Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89113
prospects.notes: NEWEST Station property (opened Dec 2023). Est. 1,000-1,500 employees. Vendor relationships may not be locked in yet ‚Äî fresh opportunity. SW Las Vegas location. Score: 88/100. Modern facility likely has updated BOH areas. Position as smart vending solution for new property.

prospects.name: Orleans Hotel & Casino (Boyd Gaming)
prospects.address: 4500 W Tropicana Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89103
prospects.notes: Boyd Gaming flagship Vegas locals property. Est. 2,000-2,500 employees. Boyd HQ: 6465 S Rainbow Blvd, (702) 792-7200. Family-owned, locals-focused ‚Äî more accessible than Strip megas. Score: 87/100. Large BOH with multiple break rooms. Boyd also operates Suncoast, Gold Coast, Sam's Town ‚Äî multi-property potential.

prospects.name: Red Rock Resort (Station Casinos)
prospects.address: 11011 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89135
prospects.notes: Station Casinos flagship property. Est. 2,000-2,500 employees. Summerlin location. Most upscale locals casino in Vegas. Score: 86/100. Use GVR/Sunset success as reference to expand here. Station corporate is next door at 1505 S. Pavilion Center Dr. Natural expansion after proving concept at Henderson properties.

activities.description: Pop-in visit by Kurtis: interested ‚Äî Great meeting!
Referral given: The Vistas at Seven Hills

todos.title: Get NetVendor Certified
todos.description: Required by Greystar and other large property management companies before you can pitch. Email compliance@netvendor.net or call 503-922-1111 (option 5). Need: LLC docs, EIN, insurance cert, W-9.
todos.notes: NetVendor certification is a gatekeeper for Greystar and other large PMCs. Get this done ASAP.

todos.title: Call Henderson Business License (702-267-1730)
todos.description: Ask about current classification and per-machine fees. Frame business as "food and beverage distribution to commercial locations using automated dispensing equipment." Check if reclassification is needed.
todos.notes: Key framing: "food and beverage distribution" NOT "vending machine operator" ‚Äî different fee structures.

todos.title: Call Clark County Business License (702-455-4252)
todos.description: Apply for separate license for machines outside Henderson. Register as wholesale/distributor, NOT vending machine operator. Describe as "automated food and beverage distribution."
todos.notes: Separate license needed for any location outside Henderson city limits.

todos.title: Order from VenMarket (triggers USG rebate enrollment)
todos.description: ONE order triggers USG enrollment. Q1 2026 cutoff is March 10. Rebates are 7-13% back on everything. Don't leave free money on table.
todos.notes: Just one order is enough to get enrolled. Rebates are 7-13% ‚Äî significant savings at scale.

todos.title: Build Proposal PDF
todos.description: Professional PDF for property managers to forward to regional. Include: machine photos, $54 rent premium stat, revenue share offer, "zero cost to property," trial period. Use Canva or community proposal builder tools.
todos.notes: PMs need something polished to send up the chain. This is your sales collateral.

todos.title: Start Pop-Ins (minimum 5/day)
todos.description: Walk into Henderson luxury apartments. Three questions: "Do you have vending? Like it? What would you change?" Bring $5 Costco gift bags. Target 4-5 per hour. Sales cycle is 10-17+ weeks ‚Äî start the clock NOW.
todos.notes: The sales cycle is 10-17+ weeks. Every day you wait pushes revenue out further. Start the clock.

todos.title: Apply for SNHD Health Permit
todos.description: Required for food/beverage vending in Clark County (~$250-400/year). Need business licenses first. Apply at SNHD Environmental Health, 280 S Decatur Blvd. Phone: 702-759-1258.
todos.notes: Southern Nevada Health District permit ‚Äî required before you can legally operate machines with food/beverages.

todos.title: Set Up WeVend Payment Processing
todos.description: Saves $1,656/year vs Stripe. ~5.5-5.9% flat, no per-transaction fee. Contact WeVend/Preva to set up account before machines arrive.
todos.notes: Big cost savings vs Stripe. Set up before machines ship.

todos.title: Order Sandstar Machine(s)
todos.description: $3,600 starting, $65/mo SaaS, 5yr warranty. Community favorite. Supports AMEX. Consider eVending financing (0% down, 0% interest, 90-day deferment) or HaHa (30% down, 6-month payoff).
todos.notes: Multiple financing options available. eVending: 0% down, 0% interest, 90-day deferment. HaHa: 30% down, 6-month payoff.

todos.title: Create Gift Bags for Pop-Ins
todos.description: $5 each from Costco. Small snack bags as icebreakers for property managers. The #1 recommended pop-in strategy from the community. Buy 20-30 to start.
todos.notes: Community consensus: gift bags are the single best icebreaker for cold pop-ins.

todos.title: Set Up Vistar Account + Build Relationship
todos.description: Have your account executive take you to lunch (even with zero locations). Do will-call pickups to build rapport. They'll bend over backwards for operators they know personally. VenMarket + Vistar = USG rebates.
todos.notes: Personal relationships with distributors = better pricing, priority service, and flexibility.

todos.title: Get Hartford Workers Comp Quote
todos.description: Some luxury apartments require workers comp even for sole operators. Hub International policy ($1,304/yr) covers GL but may need WC added. Call Hub to ask about adding it.
todos.notes: Not all properties require this, but luxury apartments often do.

todos.title: Use Clark County Jurisdiction Locator
todos.description: Map your target locations to determine which are Henderson vs unincorporated Clark County vs Las Vegas. You need a business license for EACH jurisdiction. Link: maps.clarkcountynv.gov/gismo/apps/jurisdiction/app/index.html
todos.notes: Critical step ‚Äî you need separate business licenses for each jurisdiction your machines are in.

todos.title: Stock Initial Inventory (Top Sellers)
todos.description: Joy Burst (Vegas #1), Smartwater 20oz, Celsius, Coke, Diet Coke, Fairlife, Gatorade Cool Blue. Premium water only (BOSS, Fiji, Voss). King-size candy. 1.75oz chip bags from VenMarket. Incidentals (Charmin, Tide Pods, phone chargers).
todos.notes: These are the proven top sellers in Vegas luxury apartments per community data.

todos.title: Set Up CRM (HubSpot Free)
todos.description: Free for up to 2 users. Track all prospects, pop-in dates, follow-ups, pipeline stages. Import initial Henderson apartment leads after vetting. Or use Apollo for free multi-step email sequences.
todos.notes: HubSpot free tier is plenty for starting out. Apollo is great for automated email sequences.

todos.title: Register for Sales Tax Permit
todos.description: NV Dept of Taxation. Free to register. Required to collect 8.375% sales tax in Clark County. Apply at tax.nv.gov. Phone: 866-962-3707.
todos.notes: Free to register. Clark County sales tax rate is 8.375%.

todos.title: Set Up Google Voice Number
todos.description: Never use personal phone for business. Google Voice is free. Use this on all flyers, proposals, and business cards. Community strongly recommends this.
todos.notes: Keeps personal and business separate. Free and easy to set up.

todos.title: Research Freezer Options for Phase 2
todos.description: Every platform releasing AI freezers H1 2026. Nestle/Mars incentive: 6 Nestle + 4 Mars items = free cases. Frozen meals do $12-$15 per item at 45-50% margins. Plan for adding freezers to best locations.
todos.notes: Phase 2 opportunity. Frozen meals have incredible margins (45-50%). AI freezers dropping H1 2026.

todos.title: Explore PrintWithMe Coffee Partnership
todos.description: Caffection Cymbal machine: 12 drink options, resident allowances (5-30 cups/month). Cross-sell opportunity during property pop-ins. Can reduce PM's coffee spend by 60%.
todos.notes: Great cross-sell during pop-ins. Reduces property coffee spend by 60%.

todos.title: Build Route Plan (First 5 Locations)
todos.description: Use the Route Planner on dashboard. Keep all locations within 30-35 min of West Henderson base. Optimize for Tier 1 areas first (Henderson, Green Valley, Seven Hills).
todos.notes: Use /route-planner page. Tier 1 areas: Henderson, Green Valley, Seven Hills.

revenue.name: Revenue Division
revenue.mission: Acquire locations, grow revenue, expand market share

growth.name: Growth Division
growth.mission: Build brand, generate leads, drive awareness

operations.name: Operations Division
operations.mission: Efficient fulfillment, happy customers, smooth logistics

intelligence.name: Intelligence Division
intelligence.mission: Know more than competitors, make smarter decisions

corporate.name: Corporate Division
corporate.mission: Keep the business legal, funded, and staffed

contractTemplates.name: Location Agreement ‚Äî Revenue Share
contractTemplates.description: Standard amenity partnership agreement with revenue sharing model. Pre-filled with industry best practices.
contractTemplates.body:
SMART MARKET AMENITY PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT

Revenue Share Model

Agreement #{{contract_number}}

This Amenity Partnership Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of {{start_date}} ("Effective Date") by and between:

AMENITY PARTNER:
Kand√© VendTech LLC
Henderson, NV
Phone: {{company_phone}}
Email: {{company_email}}		 PROPERTY:
{{client_name}}
{{property_address}}
Contact: {{contact_name}}
Phone: {{contact_phone}}
Email: {{contact_email}}

1. SCOPE OF SERVICES

Kand√© VendTech ("Partner") shall install, stock, maintain, and service {{machine_count}} AI-powered smart market unit(s) at the Property location(s) specified above. Services include:

  • Installation and setup of smart market equipment at zero cost to Property
  • Regular restocking with premium snacks, beverages, and convenience items
  • Ongoing maintenance, cleaning, and technical support
  • Cashless payment processing (credit/debit, mobile pay, tap-to-pay)
  • Remote monitoring and inventory optimization
  • 24/7 customer support via QR code feedback system

2. REVENUE SHARE

Partner shall pay Property a revenue share of {{rev_share_percent}}% of gross sales generated by the smart market unit(s), payable monthly. Revenue share payments shall commence {{rev_share_start}} after installation date.

Estimated monthly revenue: ${{estimated_monthly_revenue}}

3. TERM

This Agreement shall be for an initial term of {{term_years}} years commencing on the Effective Date, with automatic renewal for successive one-year periods unless either party provides written notice of non-renewal at least 60 days prior to the expiration of the then-current term.

4. EQUIPMENT & INSTALLATION

  • All equipment remains the property of Kand√© VendTech
  • Installation at zero cost to Property ‚Äî no upfront fees
  • Property shall provide suitable electrical outlet (standard 110V) and reasonable access
  • Partner responsible for all equipment maintenance and repair

5. PROPERTY OBLIGATIONS

  • Provide suitable, secure indoor location for equipment
  • Maintain adequate electrical supply and climate control
  • Grant reasonable access for restocking and maintenance (minimum 2x per week)
  • Notify Partner promptly of any equipment issues or damage
  • Not install competing snack/beverage amenity services during the term

6. PRODUCT SELECTION

Partner shall stock products based on resident/employee preferences, seasonal trends, and sales data analytics. Property may request specific products or dietary options. Partner will accommodate reasonable requests within 14 days.

7. INSURANCE & LIABILITY

Partner maintains comprehensive general liability insurance of not less than $1,000,000 per occurrence. Partner shall add Property as additional insured upon request. Partner assumes all liability for equipment operation and product quality.

8. TERMINATION

  • Either party may terminate with 60 days written notice after the initial term
  • Early termination by Property during initial term requires 90 days notice
  • Partner may terminate immediately if Property breaches exclusivity clause
  • Upon termination, Partner shall remove equipment within 14 business days

9. ADDITIONAL TERMS

{{additional_terms}}

KAND√â VENDTECH LLC



Signature

Printed Name & Title

Date

{{client_name}}



Signature

Printed Name & Title

Date

contractTemplates.name: Location Agreement ‚Äî Flat Fee
contractTemplates.description: Amenity partnership with a flat monthly fee to the property instead of revenue share.
contractTemplates.body:
SMART MARKET AMENITY PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT

Flat Fee Model

Agreement #{{contract_number}}

This Amenity Partnership Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of {{start_date}} by and between:

AMENITY PARTNER:
Kand√© VendTech LLC
Henderson, NV
Phone: {{company_phone}}
Email: {{company_email}}		 PROPERTY:
{{client_name}}
{{property_address}}
Contact: {{contact_name}}
Phone: {{contact_phone}}
Email: {{contact_email}}

1. SCOPE OF SERVICES

Kand√© VendTech ("Partner") shall install, stock, maintain, and service {{machine_count}} AI-powered smart market unit(s) at the Property. All services provided at zero cost to Property, including:

  • Equipment installation and setup
  • Regular restocking with premium products
  • Maintenance, cleaning, and technical support
  • Cashless payment processing
  • Remote monitoring and inventory management

2. FLAT FEE COMPENSATION

Partner shall pay Property a flat monthly fee of ${{monthly_fee}}, payable on the 1st of each month. Payments commence {{payment_start}} after installation date.

3. TERM

Initial term: {{term_years}} years from the Effective Date, with automatic annual renewal unless either party provides 60 days written notice of non-renewal.

4. EQUIPMENT

All equipment remains Partner property. Installation at zero cost. Property provides standard electrical outlet and reasonable access.

5. PROPERTY OBLIGATIONS

  • Provide secure, climate-controlled indoor location
  • Maintain electrical supply
  • Grant access for restocking/maintenance (minimum 2x weekly)
  • Exclusivity: no competing amenity services during term

6. INSURANCE

Partner maintains $1,000,000+ general liability coverage and will add Property as additional insured upon request.

7. TERMINATION

60 days written notice after initial term. 90 days notice for early termination during initial term. Equipment removal within 14 business days.

8. ADDITIONAL TERMS

{{additional_terms}}

KAND√â VENDTECH LLC


Signature / Date
 {{client_name}}


Signature / Date

contractTemplates.name: Pilot Program Agreement
contractTemplates.description: 30-day free trial agreement. Zero risk for the property ‚Äî the #1 closer from Skool community insights.
contractTemplates.body:
SMART MARKET PILOT PROGRAM AGREEMENT

30-Day Complimentary Trial

Pilot #{{contract_number}}

This Pilot Program Agreement is entered into as of {{start_date}} by and between:

AMENITY PARTNER:
Kand√© VendTech LLC
Henderson, NV
Phone: {{company_phone}}
Email: {{company_email}}		 PROPERTY:
{{client_name}}
{{property_address}}
Contact: {{contact_name}}
Phone: {{contact_phone}}
Email: {{contact_email}}

1. PILOT PROGRAM OVERVIEW

Kand√© VendTech ("Partner") will install {{machine_count}} AI-powered smart market unit(s) at the Property for a {{trial_days}}-day complimentary trial period at absolutely zero cost and zero obligation to the Property.

‚úÖ ZERO RISK TO PROPERTY:
  • No cost for equipment, installation, or removal
  • No long-term commitment required
  • Full service and restocking included
  • We handle everything ‚Äî you enjoy the amenity

2. PILOT TERMS

  • Duration: {{trial_days}} days from installation date
  • Cost to Property: $0 ‚Äî completely free trial
  • Services Included: Installation, stocking, maintenance, cashless payments
  • Equipment: Remains Partner property at all times

3. AFTER THE PILOT

At the end of the trial period, Property may:

  1. Continue with a full partnership ‚Äî We'll present partnership options including revenue share ({{rev_share_percent}}% of gross) or flat fee compensation
  2. End the pilot ‚Äî We'll remove equipment within 7 business days at no cost

If no decision is communicated within 7 days after the pilot ends, the trial will convert to a month-to-month arrangement with {{rev_share_percent}}% revenue share until either party provides 30 days notice.

4. PROPERTY OBLIGATIONS DURING PILOT

  • Provide indoor location with standard electrical outlet
  • Allow access for restocking (minimum 2x weekly)
  • Report any equipment issues promptly

5. INSURANCE

Partner maintains full liability coverage throughout the pilot period.

6. ADDITIONAL NOTES

{{additional_terms}}

KAND√â VENDTECH LLC


Signature / Date
 {{client_name}}


Signature / Date

contractTemplates.name: Service Level Agreement
contractTemplates.description: Defines service commitments, response times, and quality standards for the amenity partnership.
contractTemplates.body:
SERVICE LEVEL AGREEMENT

Smart Market Amenity Services

SLA #{{contract_number}} ‚Äî Effective {{start_date}}

This Service Level Agreement ("SLA") supplements the Amenity Partnership Agreement between Kand√© VendTech LLC and {{client_name}} located at {{property_address}}.

1. SERVICE COMMITMENTS

ServiceCommitment
Restocking FrequencyMinimum {{restock_frequency}} per week
Equipment Uptime{{uptime_percent}}% monthly uptime guarantee
Issue Response TimeWithin {{response_hours}} hours of notification
On-Site ResolutionWithin {{resolution_hours}} hours for critical issues
Product FreshnessAll products within sell-by date; expired items removed immediately
Machine CleanlinessExterior cleaned at each restock; deep clean monthly
Product RequestsEvaluated within 7 days; stocked within 14 days if approved

2. COMMUNICATION

  • Dedicated Contact: {{contact_name}} ‚Äî available via phone, email, and text
  • Issue Reporting: QR code on machine for instant feedback, or call/text our service line
  • Monthly Reports: Sales summary, product performance, and service log provided by the 5th of each month

3. ESCALATION PROCESS

  1. Level 1: Route driver addresses during next scheduled visit (within {{response_hours}} hrs)
  2. Level 2: Operations manager dispatched for urgent issues (within {{resolution_hours}} hrs)
  3. Level 3: Owner/principal contact for unresolved issues (within 48 hrs)

4. PERFORMANCE REVIEW

Partner will conduct quarterly performance reviews with Property management, covering sales data, product satisfaction, and service quality metrics.

5. REMEDIES

If Partner fails to meet uptime guarantee for 2 consecutive months, Property may request a service credit equal to one month of revenue share payment, or terminate the agreement with 30 days notice.

6. ADDITIONAL COMMITMENTS

{{additional_terms}}

KAND√â VENDTECH LLC


Signature / Date
 {{client_name}}


Signature / Date
